rooms.description: This open-plan space integrates the living, dining, and kitchen areas with ample natural light from large windows positioned in accordance with Vastu principles. The layout ensures a clear flow of energy.
Private master bedroom oriented towards the east for positive energy. It includes built-in closets and ample storage.
Adjacent to the kitchen area for easy access while maintaining privacy. Designed with minimalistic yet functional decor in compliance with local building norms.
A secondary bedroom designed for occasional guests, also oriented towards the east to adhere to Vastu principles.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A welcoming entrance that aligns with Vastu guidelines, ensuring a positive flow of energy.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Facilitates access to the servants' quarters and storage areas.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Strategically placed windows to allow cross-ventilation and ample daylight, in compliance with local building norms.
